title: Nato investigates hacker sale of missile firm data
description: Hackers are selling classified documents online after obtaining data belonging to missile maker MBDA.

title: Start-up denies using tech to turn call centre accents 'white'
description: Technology that changes workers' accents is accused of making "the world sound whiter".

title: How to stay cool the Japanese way
description: Japan's heatwaves are driving the need for ways to stay cool, from face masks to neck fans and vests.

title: Gamers face price rise on PS5 but not Switch
description: Sony's PlayStation 5 consoles are going up in price, while the price of a Nintendo Switch is staying the same

title: Google to run ads educating users about fake news
description: The pilot scheme will run in eastern Europe to help combat disinformation about Ukrainian refugees.
